name: Speed Limit (dbelliss)
description:
The second game I ever made. Co-created with Joshua Heideman and Thomas Tran at the UC Davis Fall Game Jam 2016. The original project files were lost, so the HTML version is slightly different from the standalone builds. Music by Kristen Kirk.

Goal:

  • Reach maximum power by running over enough speed boosts to fill up the bar in the top 
  •  If you are below maximum power, avoid traffic codes that make you lose power
  • If you are at maximum power, hit cones for more points

Controls:

  • Up and Down arrow keys or W and S to move
